page.title: 19LOCAL AMENITIES
page.content: The village has its own playing field with a football pitch, pavilion and childrens play area. The local football team plays in the Maidstone league and is very successful. The pavilion is used for many different activities including keep-fit. The children in the village have to travel to Lenham for their football. There is a long established cricket club in the village with its own very beautiful ground. Close by is the Great Danes Hotel with its own swimming pool which is open to members of the public and a village hall some 10 minutes walk from the school holds a number of social events, including the village pantomime. An activities playgroup is run during the school holidays and there is a pre-school playgroup and youthclub for the teenagers.
